value.stringValue: AND( NOT(ISNEW()), ISCHANGED([Opportunity].StageName), OR( [Opportunity].CreatedBy.Profile.Name = 'Sales', [Opportunity].CreatedBy.Profile.Name = 'Market Development Representative', [Opportunity].CreatedBy.Profile.Name = 'Account Development Manager') )

formulas.name: formula_myRule_25
formulas.expression: AND( NOT(ISNEW()), ISCHANGED({!myVariable_current.StageName}), OR( {!myVariable_current.CreatedBy.Profile.Name} = 'Sales', {!myVariable_current.CreatedBy.Profile.Name} = 'Market Development Representative', {!myVariable_current.CreatedBy.Profile.Name} = 'Account Development Manager') )

value.stringValue: AND( NOT(ISNEW()), ISCHANGED([Opportunity].StageName), OR( [Opportunity].CreatedBy.Profile.Name = 'Sales', [Opportunity].CreatedBy.Profile.Name = 'Market Development Representative', [Opportunity].CreatedBy.Profile.Name = 'Account Development Manager') )

formulas.name: formula_myRule_25_pmetrule
formulas.expression: AND( NOT(ISNEW()), ISCHANGED({!myVariable_old.StageName}), OR( {!myVariable_old.CreatedBy.Profile.Name} = 'Sales', {!myVariable_old.CreatedBy.Profile.Name} = 'Market Development Representative', {!myVariable_old.CreatedBy.Profile.Name} = 'Account Development Manager') )

value.stringValue: AND( OR(INCLUDES( [Opportunity].Product__c , "Canvas Pilot"), INCLUDES( [Opportunity].Product__c , "Bridge Pilot")), ISCHANGED( [Opportunity].StageName ), ISPICKVAL( [Opportunity].StageName, "Closed Won") )

formulas.name: formula_myRule_27
formulas.expression: AND( OR(INCLUDES( {!myVariable_current.Product__c} , "Canvas Pilot"), INCLUDES( {!myVariable_current.Product__c} , "Bridge Pilot")), ISCHANGED( {!myVariable_current.StageName} ), ISPICKVAL( {!myVariable_current.StageName}, "Closed Won") )

value.stringValue: AND( OR(INCLUDES( [Opportunity].Product__c , "Canvas Pilot"), INCLUDES( [Opportunity].Product__c , "Bridge Pilot")), ISCHANGED( [Opportunity].StageName ), ISPICKVAL( [Opportunity].StageName, "Closed Won") )

formulas.name: formula_myRule_27_pmetrule
formulas.expression: AND( OR(INCLUDES( {!myVariable_old.Product__c} , "Canvas Pilot"), INCLUDES( {!myVariable_old.Product__c} , "Bridge Pilot")), ISCHANGED( {!myVariable_old.StageName} ), ISPICKVAL( {!myVariable_old.StageName}, "Closed Won") )

value.stringValue: AND( ISPICKVAL( [Opportunity].StageName , "Closed Won"), ISCHANGED( [Opportunity].StageName ), OR(INCLUDES( [Opportunity].Product__c , "Support - Advanced"), INCLUDES( [Opportunity].Product__c , "Support - Premium"), INCLUDES( [Opportunity].Product__c , "Support - Tier 1")) )

formulas.name: formula_myRule_33
formulas.expression: AND( ISPICKVAL( {!myVariable_current.StageName} , "Closed Won"), ISCHANGED( {!myVariable_current.StageName} ), OR(INCLUDES( {!myVariable_current.Product__c} , "Support - Advanced"), INCLUDES( {!myVariable_current.Product__c} , "Support - Premium"), INCLUDES( {!myVariable_current.Product__c} , "Support - Tier 1")) )

value.stringValue: AND( ISPICKVAL( [Opportunity].StageName , "Closed Won"), ISCHANGED( [Opportunity].StageName ), OR(INCLUDES( [Opportunity].Product__c , "Support - Advanced"), INCLUDES( [Opportunity].Product__c , "Support - Premium"), INCLUDES( [Opportunity].Product__c , "Support - Tier 1")) )

formulas.name: formula_myRule_33_pmetrule
formulas.expression: AND( ISPICKVAL( {!myVariable_old.StageName} , "Closed Won"), ISCHANGED( {!myVariable_old.StageName} ), OR(INCLUDES( {!myVariable_old.Product__c} , "Support - Advanced"), INCLUDES( {!myVariable_old.Product__c} , "Support - Premium"), INCLUDES( {!myVariable_old.Product__c} , "Support - Tier 1")) )

value.stringValue: AND( NOT(ISPICKVAL([Opportunity].Segment__c, "International")), ISCHANGED([Opportunity].StageName), OR(ISPICKVAL([Opportunity].StageName, "Closed Won"), ISPICKVAL([Opportunity].StageName, "Closed Lost")), ($User.Username <> [Opportunity].Owner.Username) )

AND( NOT(ISPICKVAL([Opportunity].Segment__c, "International")), ISCHANGED([Opportunity].StageName), OR(ISPICKVAL([Opportunity].StageName, "Closed Won"), ISPICKVAL([Opportunity].StageName, "Closed Lost")), ($User.Username <> [Opportunity].Owner.Username) )

formulas.name: formula_myRule_7_pmetrule
formulas.expression: AND( NOT(ISPICKVAL({!myVariable_old.Segment__c}, "International")), ISCHANGED({!myVariable_old.StageName}), OR(ISPICKVAL({!myVariable_old.StageName}, "Closed Won"), ISPICKVAL({!myVariable_old.StageName}, "Closed Lost")), ({!$User.Username} <> {!myVariable_old.Owner.Username}) )

value.stringValue: AND( ISCHANGED([Opportunity].StageName), OR( ISPICKVAL([Opportunity].StageName, "Closed Won"), ISPICKVAL([Opportunity].StageName, "Closed DeBook Quota"), ISPICKVAL([Opportunity].StageName, "Closed DeBook Non-Quota") ) )

formulas.name: formula_myRule_9
formulas.expression: AND( ISCHANGED({!myVariable_current.StageName}), OR( ISPICKVAL({!myVariable_current.StageName}, "Closed Won"), ISPICKVAL({!myVariable_current.StageName}, "Closed DeBook Quota"), ISPICKVAL({!myVariable_current.StageName}, "Closed DeBook Non-Quota") ) )

value.stringValue: AND( ISCHANGED([Opportunity].StageName), OR( ISPICKVAL([Opportunity].StageName, "Closed Won"), ISPICKVAL([Opportunity].StageName, "Closed DeBook Quota"), ISPICKVAL([Opportunity].StageName, "Closed DeBook Non-Quota") ) )

formulas.name: formula_myRule_9_pmetrule
formulas.expression: AND( ISCHANGED({!myVariable_old.StageName}), OR( ISPICKVAL({!myVariable_old.StageName}, "Closed Won"), ISPICKVAL({!myVariable_old.StageName}, "Closed DeBook Quota"), ISPICKVAL({!myVariable_old.StageName}, "Closed DeBook Non-Quota") ) )
